mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Pacific Design Center, is a 1,200,000 square feet multi-use facility for the design community located in West Hollywood, California. Designed by Cesar Pelli, the Center is composed of the Center Blue, opened in 1975, Center Green, 1988, and Center Red, opened in 2011. The Center contains showroom space, design studios as well as Wolfgang Puck restaurants. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacific_Design_Center [work]
